member.name: D3D11_AUTHENTICATED_QUERY_OUTPUT_ID_OUTPUT
member.summary: Contains the response to a D3D11_AUTHENTICATED_QUERY_OUTPUT_ID query.

member.name: D3D11_AUTHENTICATED_QUERY_OUTPUT_ID_OUTPUT.Output
member.summary: A structure that contains a Message Authentication Code (MAC) and other data.

member.name: D3D11_AUTHENTICATED_QUERY_OUTPUT_ID_OUTPUT.CryptoSessionHandle
member.summary: A handle to the cryptographic session.

member.name: D3D11_AUTHENTICATED_QUERY_OUTPUT_ID_OUTPUT.OutputIDIndex
member.summary: The index of the output ID.

member.name: D3D11_AUTHENTICATED_QUERY_OUTPUT_ID_OUTPUT.OutputID
member.summary: An output ID that is associated with the specified device and cryptographic session.
